label: Sheet Music
name: music
description: The song the user is expected to play.

label: Tempo
name: tempo
description: The number of beats per minute that the song should be played at.

label: Automatic Keyboard Size
name: keyboardAuto
description: When set, the piano keyboard will be sized automatically to the range of the music.

label: Keyboard Low Pitch
name: noteMin
description: The lowest pitch available on the piano keyboard.

label: Keyboard High Pitch
name: noteMax
description: The highest pitch available on the piano keyboard.
